a.span: Ackerson Lake High School & Community Center

article.class: post-9431 news_story type-news_story status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

p.b: During this time ALL NCS facilities are closed including the weight room, athletic facilities, and buildings.
All activities are cancelled until further notice.

div.p: During the past two weeks the entire Napoleon staff has been hard at work developing plans to start “remote learning” for our students. This plan will be submitted for approval this week and we will provide more details in the coming week.

Our tentative plan involves a combination of on-line, phone, email and paper lessons, depending on grade level and family needs. We realize that no plan will be perfect, in the shadow of our current COVID-19 crisis, but our district is determined to do our best to meet the educational and nutritional needs of our students. If all goes as planned, our district plan will be approved and we will begin our continuity of learning with small steps during the following week. All families are encouraged to have students check their student email or other means that teachers use, to connect with families; such as Class Dojo, Schoology or Google Classroom, etc.

Our district mobile food service program will distribute sack lunches to the usual eight locations including Eby Elementary, until further notice. If you need any assistance, please contact our Food Service Director at 536-8667.

At this time, we are not able to open our buildings for student and parent access, until the Stay Home, Stay Safe Executive Order has been lifted. After this order is lifted, we will schedule times for students and parents to retrieve personal items that were left at school. If you have an emergency, please contact the school office. At this time it is too early to know when senior events might be rescheduled. We are hoping to have more information in the next two to three weeks.
Thank you for your patience as we adjust to this crisis. We will continue to share more information with you, as it becomes available.

p.b: ALL SCHOOL BUILDINGS REMAIN CLOSED AT THIS TIME AND WILL REMAIN CLOSED UNTIL THE STAY HOME, STAY SAFE ORDER IS LIFTED AND IT IS DETERMINED TO BE SAFE FOR NON-ESSENTIAL STAFF/ STUDENTS TO ENTER THE PREMISES. AS INFORMATION IS DETERMINED REGARDING WHEN LOCKERS MAY BE CLEANED OUT, ITEMS PICKED UP & FACILITIES OTHERWISE INHABITED THE COMMUNITY WILL BE NOTIFIED. WE APPRECIATE YOUR PATIENCE. GO PIRATES!

p.strong: Napoleon Community Schools recognizes the importance of staying informed. We created this temporary web area to provide important information and to help our families & community stay healthy. We are in regular contact with local officials to monitor the Coronavirus situation. We will continue to take direction from the Governor’s Office, the Michigan Department of Education, and the local health department and take careful consideration of all information provided as the situation develops.
We appreciate your patience and understanding during this stressful time.
